title: Disease Cures, Floyd Mayweather, Serena Williams, Trump and more.
itunes:title: Disease Cures, Floyd Mayweather, Serena Williams, Trump and more.
description:
Good morning we open today with movie talk and find out what each crew member like to eat in the theater.  J. Anthony Brown and Junior have their lists of cures for cancer and sickle cell.  A$AP Rocky is not liking his current conditions.  Floyd Mayweather needs to check on his ankles!  That crossover tho!!!!  Serena Williams continues the winning.  We have feel good stories just for you in tell me something good.  No matter how much power President Trump has, he cannot block anyone on Twitter.  Instagram has a new feature that can help users post things that are less hateful.  Today class in in session with J. Anthony Brown and the crew tell him what they learned today and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
